Home.heroParagraph: Hi, I'm Milo. I design and develop engaging websites and delightful digital experiences.

Work.title: My work
Work.description: In the last few years I've had the opportunity to work on a few diverse projects and demonstrate my skills. Here are some of them.

main.title: About me
main.p1: As a computer science student, I have a strong passion for web development and UI/UX design. I am driven by the creation of user-centered interfaces and experiences that are both aesthetically pleasing and empowering.
main.p2: With five years of experience in building websites, I have honed my skills in both the technical and creative aspects of web development. My interest in graphic design and poster-making has also allowed me to bring a unique perspective to my work in UI/UX design.

music.title: Oh, btw...
music.p1: I looove music. So if you're interested here's a little bit of information about that.

p2.pre: Plus if you want you can get a cool looking poster with your top artists and tracks, kind of like a

CTA.title: Let's work together
CTA.description: If you're interested in my work and think we'd be a good match, don't hesitate to reach out. Who knows, we could build something amazing together.

Contact.title: My @s
Contact.description: You can find me pretty much anywhere by typing in my name. But just in case here you can find a few links to my social platforms.

Portfolio.title: Portfolio
Portfolio.description: This is mainly a collection of poster designs I made, with a little bit of information about my past experiences.

experience.title: Experience
experience.p1: I'm a computer science student at the University of Padua. In the past five years I gathered experience as a web developer and designer through various projects.
experience.p2: I did everything going from a handful of different websites, to logo designs and some sick posters.
experience.p3: My most successful endeavor so far has been my swimming club's website which regularly gets anywhere between 700 to 500 monthly visits.
experience.p4: And of course there's the website you're staring at right now. This one was particularly fun to make.

software.title: Software
software.description: I'm proficient with a range of different applications and tools.

design.title: Design
design.p1: I used extensively Photoshop, Illustrator and Lightroom. I use Figma on a daily basis and I would say I have an advanced level of skill with it.

web.title: Web
web.p1: When developing websites I use primarily Next.js paired with TailwindCSS for styling and the Vercel platform for deployment.
web.p2: In the past I've used website builders like Wix, but I focused on Webflow since it gave me a deeper level of customization and control over the final product.

description.post: challenge. Here are some of the best ones.

cta.title: Got a question?
cta.description: Don't hesitate to reach out if you have questions about anything you just read.

p1.pre: An up to date miniature version of your

subtitle.short: In the last 3 months these have been your top five artists.
subtitle.medium: In the last 6 months these have been your top five artists.
subtitle.long: Since you created your account these have been your top five artists.

description.title: How do you get the data?
description.p1: Spotify provides a developer API (application programming interface) trough which you can request access to your data as long as you have the right access keys.
description.p2: Those special keys are being sent over when you log in and are then used to request your data when the page loads.

subtitle.short: In the last 3 months you couldn't stop listening to these five tracks.
subtitle.medium: In the last 6 months you couldn't stop listening to these five tracks.
subtitle.long: Since you created your account these have been your top five tracks.

description.title: Why is it different from my Wrapped?
description.p1: Spotify Wrapped gathers the data that it then shows you throughout the entire year while I am able to query only data relative to the last 3/6 months or since the creation of your account.
description.p2: That's why you can select only those three options in the filter bar above. Spotify's API is much more limited but the data it provides is always up to date and you don't have to wait a full year to get it.

notice.label: Notice
notice.text: I am not endorsed or sponsored by Spotify or any of their associates.
